claim: An autoimmune disease occurs when the body attacks foreign antigens

supporting.text: An autoimmune disease occurs when the body's immune system mistakenly attacks its own healthy cells and tissues, not foreign antigens.

attacks.text: An autoimmune disease occurs when the body's immune system mistakenly attacks its own healthy cells and tissues, not foreign antigens.
